main event: A driver observed a bright, round, hovering object over Cleveland Heights, Ohio on August 1, 1952.
interesting points: The object was approximately twice the size of a B-47 bomber and hovered at an altitude of around 2,000 feet.
The object suddenly accelerated at a fantastic rate of speed and disappeared from sight within seconds.
The object made no sound and there were no signs of any type of propulsion system.
The witness, a student pilot, had never seen anything like this before and was certain it was not a conventional aircraft.
Other similar sightings of luminous, fast-moving objects were reported in the area around that time.
